original: Danielsson, Åke Gabriel, disponent, Norrköping, f. 11/2/91 i Bankekind, Östergötl. 1., av dir. N. P. D. o. Mathilda Svensson. G. 17 m. Viola Drangel. Barn: Hubert f. 18, Arne 21, Åke 30. — Realex. v. Linköp. h. a. 1. 07. Res. i de europ. länd. (även Ryssl.) årl. Prakt, i Engl. 07-09, anst. i Trävaru A-B Norrköp. Exporthyv-leri sed. 17, verkst. dir. där sed. 25. Led. av styr. f. Tunabergs Trävaru A-B i Koppartorp, led. av Norrköp. hamnstyr., ordf. i direkt, f. Norrköp. sjömanshus, ordf. i Norrköp. fältritt-kl. Hobby: ridsport m. m.
translated: Danielsson, Åke Gabriel, manager, Norrköping, born February 11th, 1891 in Bankekind, Östergötland, son of N.P.D. Director and Mathilda Svensson. Married to Viola Drangel in 1917. Children: Hubert b. 1918, Arne b. 1921, Åke b. 1930. Completed secondary school in Linköping in 1907. Traveled annually to European countries (including Russia). Practical experience in England from 1907-1909. Employed by Trävaru A-B Norrköping since 1917, became production manager in 1925. Member of the board of Tunabergs Trävaru A-B in Koppartorp, member of the Norrköping port authority, chairman of the board of Norrköpings sjömanshus. Hobbies: equestrian sports, and more.
